column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
You are just the thing the vivacious observer needs.
Speak with the vivacious observer.
/dance for Notos 666.
Speak with the vivacious observer.
Obtain the bowl of fruit.
Deliver the bowl of fruit to the vivacious observer.
<gasp> You, my dear familiar, are precisely what I need! Pray help me with my research!
One of our new creations has an extremely wary disposition. Try as I might to go near it for observation, it senses my aether and flees.

As a familiar, your aether is thinner than mine, yet you seem more intelligent than your fellows. That being the case, I believe you may succeed where I have failed. Come with me behind the building─I will take you to the creation!
A creature bearing a strong resemblance to a paissa stares unflinchingly at a bowl of fruit on the ground.
There it is─Notos 666. New as it is to Elpis, the creature has yet to be given a proper name.
As I mentioned, I cannot go near it. Indeed, this is the closest I can be. I want you to approach it, and then do something to show that you are a friend. What do you think will work?
What will you do?
Return its gaze.
Perform a dance for it.

Uhhh, I strongly recommend against doing so, lest you become forever lost in its bottomless gaze... Instead, perhaps you could try gesturing to it. Something whimsical...like as a dance! Yes, I daresay that will encourage it to lower its guard!
Ah, an excellent idea! If it sees you moving in a whimsical fashion, it may well lower its guard!
So go on, try to perform a dance for Notos 666. I shall watch from here. Best of luck to you!
Go on, approach Notos 666 and perform a dance for it. I shall watch from a distance. Best of luck to you!

Notos 666, which bears a strong resemblance to a paissa, stares unflinchingly at a bowl of fruit on the ground. Try performing a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>dance<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> for it to show that you are a friend.
Notos 666 scurries off, leaving behind the bowl of fruit.
Heh heh, I witnessed it all. You did very well, my dear familiar.
Notos 666 is designed to facilitate the proliferation of fruiting trees by bearing their seeds to faraway places.
While their young are still unable to forage for themselves, 'tis the duty of male creatures to bring them food.
In leaving you the fruit, it appears to have taken you for one of its own. I wasn't sure how it would respond to your overtures, but I wasn't expecting <Emphasis>that</Emphasis>!
Go on and take your gift, and let us return to Anagnorisis. You deserve a reward for your troubles.
Thanks to your invaluable cooperation, I was able to acquire some very insightful data.
Oh, the fruit. They are rightly yours to enjoy, so go on─enjoy them!
The fruit looked good, but it tastes even better, each bite a small piece of heaven in your mouth!
Heh heh, judging by your expression, 'twould seem Notos 666 saves the choicest fruit for its young.
Though it has but come to us, I have a good feeling for the creature. When the time comes, we shall have to think up a suitably fine name for it.
Here is the reward I promised. Thanks again, my dear familiar!
